Application Security is part of our wider Financial Scale organization, which means you will work closely with Security Operations, GRC, Product Security, Front End Platform,&amp;nbsp; IT Infrastructure teams.&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt;We’re looking for individuals with a strong background and interest in penetration testing. You should have a demonstrated ability to find vulnerabilities in complex systems and craft exploits to demonstrate business impact. This role is highly cross functional and collaborative, you will have the opportunity to work with every engineering team across Brex. You should be enthusiastic about working with a variety of backgrounds, roles, and needs. &lt;li&gt;Build and contribute to a culture of collaborative security excellence through technical leadership, learning sessions, and mentorship within the team and wider organization&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; &lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Requirements&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;5+ years work experience in an Application Security or related role&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Ability to find vulnerabilities in complex systems, demonstrating business impact through custom attack chains&lt;/li&gt;
